posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have for sale a 1910 T206 Ed Abbaticchio(Brown Sleeves) card.  This is a pretty nice card, wide borders and no creasing.

Take a look for yourself.

The price is $40.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/06-002.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-002t.jpg[/IMG]

Click on the picture to look at a larger scan of the front and back.[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back. 
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board. 
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
